snippet: Merion, the site of the U.S. Open, is surrounded by residential neighborhoods.
abstract: Merion Golf Club is shoe-horned into a tightly spaced residential neighborhood, so players know the logistics and some of the day-to-day details are going to be different at United States Open than the average PGA Tour tournament; players are enjoying being part of the tight-knit and welcoming community.
lead_paragraph: Merion, the site of the U.S. Open, is surrounded by residential neighborhoods.

headline.main: Feeling at Home at Merion Golf Club
headline.print_headline: Players Are Part of the Neighborhood
